tvdb: Carmen has come to the Bauer house to kidnap Robbie, and demands that Michelle cooperate. Carmen tries to shoot Michelle, but Bill barges in and knocks the Mafia Mama out. Afterward, Michelle rewards Bill with a lip-lock. Danny finds out what happened and feels twinges of guilt. Bill arrives late and Beth spots some blood on his coat, but Bill dodges her questions. Tony talks to Eden, but surprisingly forgives her for what happened with his father and offers her a job at the club, which angers Marah. Harley goes back to Roy's apartment, but Gus is already there and Harley is forced to tell him the truth about his father.
